item.source: How I could make like if you have sub you can press a button and it does a func if the user has subscription?

item.title: How I could make like if you have sub you can press a button and it does a func if the user has subscription?
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
You can use if statements

Very simple example.

foreach (var subs in keyauthapp.user_data.subscriptions)
{
  if(subs.subscription == "testsub")
{
// rest of code if have sub with name tests
}else if (subs.subscription == "testsub2")
{
 // do something else
}

}

This is written very quick while on phone at work lol

Read full topic
